attributes.action: make Neil O'Malley wear a Monkey Outfit whilst out in Public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Neil O'Malley must be forced to wear a Monkey Outfit in public (doesn't have to made from real monkey fur, a synthetic alternative will suffice).
Failure to wear the outfit should result in imprisonment.
<Note: I'm proving a point with this petition and obviously it's not real>

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
